description: Try our easy to follow Toasties recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Toasties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread two slices of the bread with cranberry sauce. Top with ham, cheese and spinach. Season with pepper. Sandwich with remaining bread slices, pressing down firmly. Spread top side of the sandwiches with butter.

Heat a nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Place sandwiches, buttered sides down, into pan and cook for 2 minutes or until golden. Spread tops of sandwiches with remaining butter. Turn and cook for 2 minutes or until golden. Cut in half and serve.
